task.title: Edit Business Rules Access Rights
task.shortdesc: Edit the UltiPro Business Rules access rights for employees assigned to a selected role on the Business Rules Access Rights page.

context.p: The available access rights include View and Edit. Assigned access rights for each business rule are indicated with icons on the Business Rules Access Rights page:

ul.li: Green check marks indicate rights that are enabled.
Unchecked boxes indicate rights that are disabled.

step.cmd: From the Business Rules Access Rights page, assign access rights to each business rule:

ul.li: Check the View box to enable view-only access rights.
Check the Edit box to enable viewing and editing access rights.
Uncheck any box to disable the assigned access rights.

step.cmd: Select the Description / Role Types, Web Access Rights, or Standard Reports Access Rights tab to add or change other role information, as desired.

note.p: The Standard Reports Access Rights and Business Rules Access Rights tabs only appear if an appropriate role type is selected on the Description / Role Types page.

step.cmd: Select Save. The Role Administration page appears.

link.linktext: Add or Change Role Information and Role Types
